_sText:
Installing the map is easy. Simply copy the surf_trickle.bsp to your maps folder (or your servers maps folders), and thats it.

The best settings to play the map with are:
sv_airaccelerate 1000
sv_gravity 800

Hope you enjoy the map, if you have any questions/comments/suggestions please pm HyPz or jessandrosie on FPSBanana.

Map by Jedi and ToySoldiers!
